name: 日日夜夜
description:
Note: The characters in this game are all over 18 years old.

Story Overview

Living alone in peace.
Interrupted by a silver-haired woman who fell from the sky.
but.
Although she brought her home with good intentions.
"Too many strange and troublesome things?"
"My little partner who grew up is already very troublesome. Isn't it more troublesome if this is another one?"
"Ah, I can cook and do housework. That's fine."
"Wait for Xia Kui! I definitely didn't accept her because of strange thoughts!"
Life full of surprises and troubles begins。

Introduction of main characters


LUNA
The silver-haired female demon that has fallen from the sky has an unknown life experience. After being taken in by Canghai (player), it shows the restraint and politeness that the traditional demon does not have.


Xia Kui
The partner who grew up with Cang Hai (player), although one year younger than Cang Hai, always likes to put on the frame of her sister, and is an extremely strong girl.


Cang Hai
The male protagonist controlled by the player likes to describe himself as a "common civilian passing by".

Game Features
Exquisite short text adventure game.
Relaxing and pleasant atmosphere.
Three beautiful endings.
